== Ongallur -I (CT) (627597) ==

Ongallur -I (CT) is a town in the [[Ottappalam]] taluka of [[Palakkad]] district with an area of 15.31 sq. km. and harbouring 3495 households with total population of 16998 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Palakkad]] is at a distance of 50 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 340 km. Male population is 8310 and female population is 8688. Scheduled Caste population is 2054 and Scheduled Tribes population is 7. Census Location Code of the town is 627597<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class IV (population_total 10,000 to 19,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Palakkad (m) at a distance of 50 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Coimbatore(m corp. )  at a distance of 76 km. Railway station is at Pattambi at a distance of 2 km.
